name: Frozen Piña Colada
description: This drink needs no introduction, and it’s a good reason to have coconut cream, pineapple and maraschino cherries in the fridge. Try raising the bar with Italian maraschinos. (The New York Times)
keywords: cream of coconut, pineapple juice, rum, summer
recipeIngredient:
4 ounces Coco Lopez
cream of coconut

recipeInstructions.text: Blend ingredients until smooth and frosty.

Pour into tall, chilled glasses and garnish
with pineapple slices, maraschino
cherries (and paper umbrellas, if you’ve
got ’em).
